context.p: The RPCMonitor template must be bound to the device class or device you want to monitor. Follow these steps to enable monitoring:

li.p: Select Infrastructure from the navigation bar.
Click the device name in the device list.
Select Configuration Properties from the left panel.
Set the appropriate RPC command to test in the zRPCCommand configuration property (for example, nfs or ypserv).
Expand Monitoring Templates, and then select Device from the left panel.
Select Bind Templates from the Action menu.
Add the RPCServer template to the list of selected templates, and then click Submit.
The RPCServer template is added to the lists of monitoring templates. You can now collect the RPCServer server metrics from the device.
